DOC.brief_title: Exercise Nutrition Program Improving Physical Activity Dietary Behavior Non-Active , Overweight , Obese Latinas
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Adapt effective evidence-based exercise nutrition program meet need rural Latinas . II . Implement adapt program rural Latina population . III . Evaluate feasibility potential improve physical activity dietary behavior adapt program rural Latina population . OUTLINE : Phase I : Create community advisory board adapt Strong Women Healthy Hearts Program ( SWHHP ) use feedback exist SWHHP Latinas reside community . Phase II : Participants randomize 1 2 group . INTERVENTION GROUP : Participants undergo instructor-led exercise nutrition education class 60 minute twice week 12 week . CONTROL GROUP : Participants place wait-list receive intervention 12 week undergo exercise nutrition education class Intervention Group .
DOC.criteria: Phase I : Bilingual Latina Live community Phase II : Latina Currently nonactive ( exercise two day less per week ) Overweight obese ( body mass index [ BMI ] 24 great ) A medical condition precludes moderatevigorous physical activity determine health care provider Pregnancy
